channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-8327] Consolidate class loaders
item.description: HBASE-1936 introduced a class loader to load filter classes dynamically. We have a coprocessor class loader. These two usecases are a little different. However, some logic is similar, especially in the test code. We should do some refactory and reuse some code.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

This patch appears to have added a javadoc warning:
[WARNING] /home/jenkins/jenkins-slave/workspace/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/trunk/hbase-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/util/ClassLoaderBase.java:57: warning - @param argument "conf" is not a parameter name.

Can you guys do an addendum to fix?
